articles.content: Consulting and product management domains led recruitment at IIM Bangalore, where lateral and final placements for the PGP and PGP-BA Class of 2021-23 saw 606 offers being made to 512 students.Consul… [+2233 chars]

articles.title: Explained: How UPI LITE makes small payments faster & easier - Business Insider India
articles.description: UPI LITE lets you do instant transactions of up to ₹200 or less without using a PIN.Transactions are made using a wallet and not from a linked bank account.Transactions
